seg.quote: He was naked except for a pair of underpants.
They seized towels to hide their nakedness.

sense.def:
Predmet, ki je
naked
, ni pokrit.

seg.quote: Never look for a gas leak with a naked flame.

sense.def:
Izraz
naked
uporabljamo tudi za opis vedenja ali močnih čustev, ki niso tako ali drugače prikrita.

seg.quote: The home employment offered to housewives is naked exploitation.
His face broke into an expression of naked anxiety.

sense.def:
Kadar človek nekaj vidi
with the naked eye
, lahko tisto vidi brez daljnogleda, teleskopa ali mikroskopa.
